TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TypedMessageConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 将类型化的消息转换为非类型化的消息，或将非类型化的消息转换为类型化的消息。

span.span: Converts a typed message to an untyped message, or an untyped message to a typed message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可用于将类型化的消息转换为非类型化的消息或将非类型化的消息转换为类型化的消息。This class provides functionalities to convert a typed message to an untyped message, or an untyped message to a typed message. 类型化的消息是已批注的 属性的类型实例。A typed message is an instance of a type that has the attribute annotated. 非类型化的消息是 类的实例。An untyped message is one that is an instance of the class. 您可以先利用 批注一个类型，从而创建一个自定义消息类型，然后使用此类提供的方法将其转换为非类型化的 实例。You can annotate a type with the to create a custom message type, and then use the methods provided by this class to convert it to an untyped instance.

span.span: An untyped message.

summary.span: 从指定的 实例创建一个类型化的消息。

span.span: Creates a typed message from the specified instance.

returns.span: 一个为类型化的消息的对象。

span.span: An object that is a typed message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法采用非类型化 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 消息，即的实例， 并将其转换为类型化的消息，即批注的类型的实例 。This method takes an untyped Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) message, that is, an instance of , and converts it into a typed message, that is, an instance of a type that is annotated by the .

summary.span: 从指定的类型化消息创建一个 实例。

span.span: Creates a instance from the specified typed message.

span.span: A typed message.

param.span: 一个指定与消息关联的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 的版本的 。

span.span: A that specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message.

summary.span: 使用指定的版本，从指定的类型化消息创建一个 实例。

span.span: Creates a instance from the specified typed message using the specified version.
